hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

locations.Bottom of the Well Center Skulltula Ches: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that quest guidance can be found at a talking rock.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Wallet#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Desert Colossus# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs a #Great Fairy Fountain#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the way of the hero.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #the souls of the Spike Enemy#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that plundering #the Temple of Time# is a foolish choice.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #a Zora Tunic# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Wallet#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #lighting flames in the royal tomb# rewards #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides the #Bombchu Shop#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Domain# is a foolish choice.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #Jabu Jabu's Belly#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #cow in Gerudo Valley# gifts #a Green Rupee#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: Have you seen my dodongo? Very large, eats everything, responds to "King".^Call Darunia in Goron City if found. Huge rupee reward!

LH (Lab).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the path to the #Kokiri Emerald#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #the souls of the Peahat#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that ##the Haunted Wasteland## has #2# major items.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.
hinted_locations: Kak Near Odd Medicine Building Pot 1

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# is on the path to #the Key#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #the Thieves' Hideout# is on the path of #the hero#.
hinted_locations: Hideout 2 Torch Jail In Cell Pot 2

SFM (Saria).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple After Wind Hidden Chest

ToT (Right).text: They say that on the path to the #right hand of the Spirit Temple# a chest and a spider hold...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #a Zora Scale#.

Spirit Temple GS Hall After Sun Block Room

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the way of the hero.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that ##the Desert Colossus## has #1# major item.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #the souls of the Anubis# can be found at #Zora's River#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that in the #crater, a spider in a crate and a single scrub# guard...^ #the souls of the Gohma Larvae# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.
